>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/isformpdf"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if the PDF file is form or not.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2501}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Boolean value: true - the PDF file is form, false - the PDF file is not a form","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}},"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}},"text/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
